title: Subtraction Binomial Square Formula
text: We compare our expression to the subtraction binomial square formula: $${\left(a-b\right)}^2=a^2-2a b+b^2$$.
speech: We compare our expression to the subtraction binomial square formula:  parentheses a minus b,  squared is equal to a squared minus 2 a b, plus b squared .
pacedSpeech: We compare our expression to the subtraction binomial square formula:    a minus b,  squared is equal to a squared minus 2 a b, plus b squared

title: Compare the Binomial\n
speech: parentheses a minus b,  squared \n, parentheses, 3 x minus y,  squared

title: Identify a
text: What is a in the expression?

title: Identify $$b$$
speech: What is  b  in the expression?

title: Plug in the Terms
text: Substitute $$a=3x$$ and $$b=y$$ into the subtraction binomial square formula:\n$${\left(a-b\right)}^2=a^2+2a b+b^2$$\n$${\left(3x-y\right)}^2={\left(3x\right)}^2-2\times3x y+y^2$$
speech: Substitute  a is equal to, 3 x  and  b, is equal to y  into the subtraction binomial square formula:\n, parentheses a minus b,  squared is equal to a squared plus 2 a b, plus b squared \n, parentheses, 3 x minus y,  squared is equal to parentheses 3 x  squared minus, 2 times 3 x y plus y squared

title: Simplify
speech: 9 x squared, minus 6 x y, plus y squared
